subject: Interview Schedule for Data Engineer Role
body:
Hi,
We would like to schedule an interview with you on Monday at 3 PM. Please confirm your availability.
Regards,
HR Team

subject: TechDaily Weekly Newsletter
body: Welcome to this week's edition of TechDaily. In this issue, we cover AI trends, cloud updates, and more.

subject: You won a million dollars!!!
body: Click this suspicious link to claim your prize immediately.

subject: Action required: Project status update
body:
Hi,
Please share the current status of the data pipeline project immediately.
Thanks,
Manager

subject: Meeting agenda for tomorrow
body:
Hey,
Can we finalize the agenda for tomorrow's client call? I suggest we cover progress, blockers, and next steps.
Let me know your thoughts.
Regards,
Colleague

subject: Password Expiry Notification
body: Your account password will expire in 3 days. Please change your password to avoid login issues.

subject: Request for data report
body:
Hi,
Could you please share the usage report for October by this Friday?
Regards,
Client

subject: Buy 1 Get 3 FREE!!!
body: Limited-time offer on random products you never asked for.

subject: Sprint Planning Meeting
body:
Hi,
We will have a sprint planning meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Please come prepared with your task estimates.
Thanks,
Team Lead
